plugin.name: xBroadcast_Noexp
plugin.author: Bast
plugin.purpose: Sends updates when noexp is toggle
plugin.description:
[FOR PLUGIN AUTHORS ONLY]
Detects when noexp is toggled
Example:
function OnPluginBroadcast (msg, id, name, text) if id == "aaa65ac8122d795ad5348dcd" then if msg == 1 then -- noexp on elseif msg == 2 then -- noexp off end end -- noexp changed end

trigger.name: noexp
trigger.match: ^You will no longer receive experience. Happy questing!$

trigger.name: expon
trigger.match: ^You will now receive experience. Happy leveling!$

muclient.script:
require "var" require "pluginhelper"
function noexp(name, line, wildcards) if name == 'noexp' then phelper:broadcast(1) phelper.noexp = true elseif name == 'expon' then phelper:broadcast(2) phelper.noexp = false end
end

phelper:add_setting('noexp', {help="true if noexp is on, false otherwise", type="bool", default=false, readonly=true})
phelper:set_default('cmd', 'bnoexp') phelper:set_default('plugin_colour', 'orange')
phelper:enable()
